Title: Travel Ground Good Plains
Items: this area of the grasslands seem to be bursting with color, as the wildflowers are all in bloom here
the ground is smooth making travel painless
the earth here is dry and uncluttered, reducing fatigue
tall hedgerows nearby allow you to travel comfortably in their shade
birds among the tall grasses seem to sing you a traveling song as you progress
sturdy packed ground is welcomed as solid footing for weary legs
the dry soil here is packed hard together, making travel effortless
there are short berms throughout the area, however none of them seem to be in your way
a smooth, even grade in this part of the grassland makes travel uncomplicated
the soil here has been worn away, leaving smooth bedrock underfoot
the area is delightfully free of any thick underbrush
a soft rich soil layer sits atop the stone underneath, providing a light cusion to each footfall
scattered trees lining the path provide dappled shade
the area is absolutely teeming with flowering grasses of various color
large hedgerows periodically shade your path
the absence of thick undergrowth and other obstacles makes it twice as easy
a layer of tilled earth covers the ground, providing a light cusion to each footfall
the grasses here are shorter, which is a nice change of pace
the stiff breeze keeps biting insects at bay
a crystal-clear stream runs along your path
